summary:

  "summary": "The file defines a helper function that processes a generation event, extracting relevant information and updating the UI step with the new content.",

Should incorporate both functions. Provide summary of module: provides utilities for integrating Mistral AI with Chainlit, handling instrumentation and UI updates for new generations. Business intent: enable real-time streaming of model outputs and optional instrumentation for monitoring. Keywords: Mistral AI, Chainlit, generation handling, UI step update, instrumentation, async, timestamp, etc.

Let's craft JSON.assistantfinal{
  "summary": "This module supplies utility functions that bridge Mistral AI generation events with the Chainlit UI framework. One helper processes new generation callbacks, extracting the generated text and updating the current UI step so users see the latest output. Another (currently unused) function is intended to instrument Mistral AI calls for monitoring or logging purposes.",
  "business_intent": "To provide real‑time synchronization between Mistral AI model outputs and the Chainlit front‑end, ensuring that generated content is displayed promptly to users, while also offering a hook for future instrumentation or analytics of Mistral AI interactions.",

    "Mistral AI",
    "Chainlit",
    "generation callback",
    "UI step update",
    "real‑time streaming",
    "instrumentation",
    "async handling",
    "content extraction",
    "monitoring"
  ]
}
